src: "Issa għandna ġrieden ta' 4 xhur li mhumiex dijabetiċi li qabel kienu dijabetiċi," huwa żied.
mt: "Now we have a four-month period that was not diabetic that was previously diabetic," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professur tal-mediċina fl-Università Dalhousie ġewwa Halifax, Nova Scotia u president tad-diviżjoni klinika u xjentifika tal-Assoċjazzjoni Kanadiża tad-Dijabete wissa li r-riċerka għadha fil-bidu tagħha.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical and scientific division, said the research is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Bħal xi esperti oħra, huwa xettiku dwar jekk id-dijabete tistax titfejjaq, u jinnota li dawn is-sejbiet m’għandhom l-ebda rilevanza għal nies li diġà għandhom dijabete tat-Tip 1.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be reversed, and notes that these findings have no relevance for people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Nhar it-Tnejn, Sara Danius, segretarja permanenti tal-Kumitat Nobel għal-Letteratura fl-Akkademja Żvediża, ħabbret pubblikament waqt programm tar-radju fuq Sveriges Radio fl-Iżvezja li l-kumitat, peress li ma rnexxielux jikkuntattja lil Bob Dylan direttament dwar ir-rebħ tal-Premju Nobel għal-Letteratura tal-2016, abbanduna l-isforzi tiegħu biex jikkuntattjah.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee, because it has been unable to contact Bob Dylan directly about his win of the 2016 Nobel Prize for Literature, has given up its efforts to contact him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius qal, "Bħalissa m’aħna qed nagħmlu xejn. Ċempilt u bgħatt emails lill-eqreb kollaboratur tiegħu u rċevejt tweġibiet kordjali ħafna. Għalissa, dan żgur huwa biżżejjed."
mt: Danius said, "Right now we're doing nothing. We've sent emails to our closest collaborators and received very cordial replies. Right now, this is surely enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Preċedentement, il-Kap Eżekuttiv ta’ Ring, Jamie Siminoff, irrimarka li l-kumpanija bdiet meta l-qanpiena tal-bieb tiegħu ma kinitx tinstema’ mill-ħanut tiegħu fil-garaxx.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff remarked that the company began when his front doorbell didn’t ring from his hardware store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Huwa bena qanpiena tal-bieb bil-WiFi, qal.
mt: He built a WiFi-enabled window, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff qal li l-bejgħ żdied wara li fl-2013 deher f’episodju ta’ Shark Tank fejn il-bord tal-ispettaklu naqas milli jiffinanzja n-negozju ġdid.
mt: Siminoff said the sale increased after appearing on an episode of Shark Tank in 2013, where the show’s board of investors declined to finance the new business.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Lejn tmiem l-2017, Siminoff deher fuq l-istazzjon tat-televiżjoni tax-xiri QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring wasal għal soluzzjoni ta’ kawża ma’ kumpanija tas-sigurtà li tikkompeti, il-Korporazzjoni ADT.
mt: Ring has reached a solution with the safety company that competes, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Waqt li vaċċin sperimentali wieħed jidher li kapaċi jnaqqqas il-mortalità tal-Ebola, sa issa, l-ebda mediċina ma ntweriet b'mod ċar li hija adatta għat-trattament tal-infezzjoni eżistenti.
mt: While one experimental vaccine appears to reduce Ebola mortality, no medicine has yet been shown to be effective in treating existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Cocktail wieħed ta’ antikorpi, ZMapp, inizjalment wera potenzjal fil-qasam, iżda studji formali indikaw li kellu inqas benefiċċju minn dak imfittex fil-prevenzjoni tal-mewt.
mt: 1 of 2: One cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially showed promise, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than expected in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Fil-prova PALM, ZMapp serva bħala kontroll, li jfisser li x-xjentisti użawh bħala linja bażi u qabblu t-tliet trattamenti l-oħra miegħu.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning the scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Il-USA Gymnastics tappoġġja l-ittra tal-Kumitat Olimpiku tal-Istati Uniti u taċċetta l-ħtieġa assoluta tal-familja Olimpika li tippromwovi ambjent sikur għall-atleti kollha tagħna.
mt: USA Gymnastics endorsed the letter of the U.S. Olympic Committee and accepted the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Aħna naqblu mal-istqarrija tal-USOC li l-interessi tal-atleti u l-klabbs tagħna, u l-isport tagħhom, jistgħu jiġu moqdijin aħjar billi nagħmlu progress b'tibdil sinifikanti fi ħdan l-organizzazzjoni tagħna, aktar milli bit-tneħħija taċ-ċertifikazzjoni.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and our teams, and their sport, can be better served by making progress with significant changes within our organization, rather than by the removal of certification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Il-USA Gymnastics tappoġġja investigazzjoni indipendenti li tista' titfa' dawl dwar kif l-abbuż tal-proporzjon deskritt b'tant kuraġġ minn dawk li salvaw minn Larry Nassar baqa' ma nkixifx għal tant żmien u tħaddan kwalunkwe bidla meħtieġa u xierqa.
mt: The USA Gymnastics endorsed an independent investigation that could shed light on how the abuse described with such courage by those who saved from Larry Nassar remained unfixed for so long and whether any needed or required changes were made.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Il-USA Gymnastics u l-USOC għandhom l-istess għan — li jagħmlu l-isport tal-ġinnastika, u oħrajn, sikur kemm jista' jkun għall-atleti biex isegwu l-ħolm tagħhom f'ambjent sikur, pożittiv u awtorizzat.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — to make gymnastics, and others, sure as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive, and authorized environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Matul is-sittinijiet, Brzezinski ħadem għal John F. Kennedy bħala l-konsulent tiegħu u mbagħad għall-amministrazzjoni ta' Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: During the sixties, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then for Lyndon B. Johnson's administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Matul lis-selezzjonijiet tal-1976 huwa ta parir lil Carter dwar il-politika barranija, imbagħad serva bħala Konsulent tas-Sigurtà Nazzjonali (NSA) mill-1977 sal-1981, wara Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 was advising Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Bħala NSA, huwa għen lil Carter fl-immaniġġjar diplomatiku tal-affarijiet dinjija, bħall-Ftehimiet ta’ Camp David, 1978; in-normalizzazzjoni tar-relazzjonijiet bejn l-Istati Uniti u ċ-Ċina matul l-aħħar tas-snin sebgħin; ir-Rivoluzzjoni Iranjana, li wasslet għall-kriżi tal-ostaġġi fl-Iran, 1979; u l-invażjoni Sovjetika fl-Afganistan, 1979.
mt: As NSA, he assisted Carter in the diplomatic management of world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; the normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late seventies; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the hostage crisis in Iran, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Il-film, li jieħdu sehem fih Ryan Gosling u Emma Stone, irċieva nominazzjonijiet fil-kategoriji ewlenin kollha.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling u Stone rċevew nominazzjonijiet għall-Aqwa Attur u l-Aqwa Attriċi rispettivament.
mt: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Best Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: In-nominazzjonijiet l-oħra jinkludu l-Aħjar Film, Direttur, Ċinematografija, Disinn tal-Kostumi, Editjar tal-Film, Mużika Oriġinali, Disinn tal-Produzzjoni, Editjar tal-Ħoss, Taħlit tal-Ħoss u Screenplay Oriġinali.
mt: Other nominations include Best Film, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Music, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Żewġ diski mill-film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) u City of Stars, ġew nominati għall-aħjar kanzunetta oriġinali. L-istudio Lionsgate irċieva 26 nominazzjoni — aktar minn kull studio ieħor.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. The studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Tard nhar il-Ħadd, il-President tal-Istati Uniti Donald Trump, fi stqarrija mogħtija permezz tas-segretarju tal-istampa, ħabbar li t-truppi Amerikani se jitilqu mis-Sirja.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement released through the press secretary, announced that American troops will withdraw from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: It-tħabbira saret wara li Trump kellu konverżazzjoni bit-telefown mal-President Tork Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: It-Turkija se tieħu f'idejha wkoll l-għassa tal-ġellieda tal-ISIS maqbudin li, qalet l-istqarrija, in-nazzjonijiet Ewropej irrifjutaw li jirripatrijaw.
mt: Turkey will also take custody of the captured ISIS leaders, which, the statement said, European nations refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Dan mhux biss jikkonferma li mill-inqas xi dinosawri kellhom ir-rix, teorija diġà mifruxa ħafna, imma jipprovdi dettalji li l-fossili ġeneralment ma jistgħux jagħtu, bħall-kulur u l-arranġament tridimensjonali.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details that fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Ix-xjenzati jistqarru li r-rix ta’ dan l-annimal kien kannella kulur il-qastan fin-naħa ta’ fuq u l-qiegħ huwa ċar jew kulur ta’ karotenojdi.
mt: Scientists say the tail of this animal was yellow on top and the belly is clear or carotenoid.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Is-sejba tipprovdi informazzjoni wkoll dwar l-evoluzzjoni tar-rix fl-għasafar.
mt: The study also provides information on the evolution of the rix in the birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Minħabba li r-rix tad-dinosawru m’għandhomx xaft żviluppat tajjeb, imsejjaħ rachis, iżda għandhom karatteristiċi oħra ta’ rix — “barbs” u “barbules” — ir-riċerkaturi ddeduċew li r-rachis x’aktarx kien żvilupp evoluzzjonarju li seħħ wara dawn il-karatteristiċi l-oħra.
mt: Because the tails of dinosaurs don’t have a good developed neck, called the rachis, but have other characteristics of the tail — “barbs” and “barbules” — the researchers deduced that the rachis probably evolved after these other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: L-istruttura tar-rix tissuġġerixxi li ma kienux jintużaw għat-titjir iżda pjuttost għar-regolazzjoni tat-temperatura jew għall-wiri. Ir-riċerkaturi ssuġġerew li, minkejja li dan huwa d-denb ta’ dinosawru żgħir, il-kampjun juri rix ta’ adult u mhux rix irqiq u artab taż-żgħar.
mt: The structure of the tail suggests it was not used for flight but for temperature regulation or wiring. The researchers suggest that, despite this being the tail of a small dinosaur, the specimen shows the tail of an adult and not a juvenile and a tail of a young one.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ir-riċerkaturi ssuġġerew li, minkejja li dan huwa d-denb ta' dinosawru żgħir fl-età, il-kampjun juri rix tal-adulti u mhux il-pil ta' fellus.
mt: The researchers suggested that, despite this being the leg of a small dinosaur in age, the sample shows the remains of adults and not the tail of a juvenile.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Karozza bomba splodiet fil-kwartieri ġenerali tal-pulizija f'Gaziantep, fit-Turkija, ilbieraħ filgħodu u qatlet żewġ uffiċjali tal-pulizija u korriet aktar minn għoxrin persuna oħra.
mt: A car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning and killed two police officers and wounded more than 20 other people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: L-uffiċċju tal-gvernatur qal li dsatax-il persuna minn dawk midruba kienu uffiċjali tal-pulizija.
mt: 16 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Il-pulizija qalu li jissuspettaw allegat militant tad-Daesh (ISIL) b’responsabbiltà għall-attakk.
mt: Police said they suspect an alleged ISIL militant for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Huma sabu li x-Xemx taħdem fuq l-istess prinċipji bażiċi bħall-istilel l-oħra: L-attività tal-istilel kollha fis-sistema nstabet li kienet immexxija mil-luminożità tagħhom, ir-rotazzjoni tagħhom, u xejn iżjed.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as the other stars: All the activity in the system was found to be driven by its luminosity, its rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Il-luminożità u r-rotazzjoni jintużaw flimkien biex jiddeterminaw in-numru Rossby ta’ stilla, li huwa relatat mal-fluss tal-plażma.
mt: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a jet, which is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Aktar ma jkun żgħir in-numru Rossby, inqas tkun attiva l-istilla fir-rigward tat-treġġigħ lura manjetiku.
mt: The more Rossby waves there are, the less active the jet stream is in terms of meandering.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Matul il-vjaġġ tiegħu, Iwasaki sab problemi f’ħafna okkażjonijiet.
mt: During his flight, Iwasaki encountered problems in many occasions.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Huwa ġie misruq minn pirati, attakkat fit-Tibet minn kelb bl-idrofobija, ħarab miż-żwieġ fin-Nepal u ġie arrestat l-Indja.
mt: He was kidnapped by pirates, attacked by a dog with hydrophobia, ran away from his wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: L-istandard 802.11n jaħdem kemm fuq il-frekwenzi 2.4Ghz kif ukoll fuq 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n works on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Dan se jippermettilu li jkun kompatibbli b'lura mal-802.11a, 802.11b u 802.11g, sakemm l-istazzjon bażi jkollu radjijiet doppji.
mt: 802.11n will allow it to be compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, as long as the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Il-veloċitajiet ta' 802.11n huma sostanzjalment aktar veloċi minn dawk tal-preċedessuri tiegħu b'throughput teoretika massimu ta' 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are substantially faster than its predecessors with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, li hija miżżewwġa b’żewġt itfal adulti, ma għamlitx xi impressjoni kbira fuq Miller, li l-istorja kienet relatata miegħu.
mt: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not make a big impression on Miller, who said the story was related to him.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Meta ġie mistoqsi għal kumment, Miller qal, "Mike jitkellem ħafna waqt is-smigħ...jien kont qed nipprepara u għalhekk fir-realtà ma kontx qed nisma' dak li kien qed jgħid."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the flight...I was preparing and so in reality I wasn't really listening to what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Se nagħmlu ħilitna biex innaqsu l-emissjonijiet tad-dijossidu tal-karbonju għal kull unità tal-PGD b'marġni notevoli sal-2020 mil-livell tal-2005, qal Hu.
mt: We will do our best to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 from the 2005 level, Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Huwa ma stabbilixxiex figura għat-tnaqqis, u qal li dawn se jsiru abbażi tal-produzzjoni ekonomika taċ-Ċina.
mt: He did not provide a figure for the decline, and said it would be based on China's economic production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu ħeġġeġ lill-pajjiżi li qed jiżviluppaw "biex jevitaw il-perkors antik li l-ewwel tniġġes u mbagħad tnaddaf wara."
mt: He urged countries to develop "to avoid the ancient route that first ignited and then burned after."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Huwa żied jgħid li, "madankollu, jintalbu jassumu obbligi li jmorru lil hinn mill-istadju tal-iżvilupp, ir-responsabbiltà u l-kapaċitajiet tagħhom."
mt: He added that, "however, it is urged to assume obligations to go beyond the development stage, responsibility and capabilities of them."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Il-Grupp ta’ Studju tal-Iraq ippreżenta r-rapport tiegħu f’12.00 GMT illum.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Huwa jwissi li Ħadd ma jista’ jiggarantixxi li kwalunkwe azzjoni li tittieħed l-Iraq f’dan il-punt se twaqqaf il-gwerra settarja, il-vjolenza li qed tikber, jew dixxendenza lejn il-kaos.
mt: He says it is impossible to guarantee that any action taken by Iraq at this point will stop the sectarian war, the violence that is growing, or the descent toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ir-Rapport jibda b'talba għal dibattitu miftuħ u l-formazzjoni ta' kunsens fl-Istati Uniti dwar il-politika rigward il-Lvant Nofsani.
mt: The report begins with a call for an open debate and the formation of consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Ir-Rapport jikkritika b'mod qawwi kważi kull aspett tal-politika preżenti tal-Eżekuttiv fir-rigward tal-Iraq u jħeġġeġ bidla immedjata fid-direzzjoni.
mt: The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the Executive's current policy towards Iraq and urges immediate change in direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: L-ewwel waħda fost it-78 rakkomandazzjoni tiegħu hija li għandha tittieħed inizjattiva diplomatika ġdida qabel tispiċċa din is-sena biex il-fruntieri tal-Iraq ikunu żgurati kontra interventi ostili u biex jerġgħu jiġu stabbiliti relazzjonijiet diplomatiċi mal-ġirien tagħha.
mt: One of the 78 recommendations he made is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Is-senatur attwali u l-First Lady tal-Arġentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ħabbret il-kandidatura presidenzjali tagħha lbieraħ filgħaxija ġewwa La Plata, belt 50 kilometru (31 mil) ’il bogħod minn Buenos Aires.
mt: The current senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometres (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Is-Sinjura Kirchner ħabbret l-intenzjoni tagħha li tikkontesta għal president fit-Teatru Arġentin, l-istess post li kienet tuża biex tibda l-kampanja tagħha tal-2005 għas-Senat bħala membru tad-delegazzjoni tal-provinċja ta’ Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to contest for president at the Teatro Argentino, the same place she used to start her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Id-dibattitu tqanqal minn kontroversja dwar l-infiq fuq għajnuna u rikostruzzjoni wara l-Uragan Katrina; li xi konservattivi fiskali semmewh b’mod umoristiku "d-Deal ta’ New Orleans ta’ Bush."
mt: The debate was heated by controversy over spending on aid and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives dubbed the "New Orleans Deal of Bush" in a humorous manner.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Il-kritika liberali tal-isforz ta’ rikostruzzjoni ffokat fuq l-għoti ta’ kuntratti ta’ rikostruzzjoni lil dawk perċepiti bħala nies ta’ ġewwa ta’ Washington.
mt: The liberal criticism of the focused reconstruction effort on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to those perceived as insiders of Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Iktar minn erba’ miljun persuna marru Ruma biex jattendu l-funeral.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: In-numru ta’ nies preżenti kien tant kbir li ma kienx possibbli li kulħadd li jkollu aċċess għall-funeral fi Pjazza San Pietru.
mt: The number of people present was so great that it was not possible for everyone who had access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Diversi skrins kbar tat-televiżjoni ġew installati f’diversi postijiet ġewwa Ruma biex in-nies ikunu jistgħu jaraw iċ-ċerimonja.
mt: Several large television screens were installed in various locations in Rome so that people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: F’ħafna bliet oħra tal-Italja u fil-bqija tad-dinja, partikolarment fil-Polonja, saru arranġamenti simili, li kienu jarawhom għadd kbir ta’ nies.
mt: In many other Italian cities and the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements were made, which saw a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: L-istoriċi kkritikaw il-politiki tal-FBI tal-passat talli ffukaw ir-riżorsi fuq każijiet li faċli jissolvew, speċjalment każijiet ta’ karozzi misruqa, bil-għan li tingħata spinta lir-rata ta’ suċċess tal-aġenzija.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI’s past policies of focusing resources on cases that were easy to solve, especially car bomb cases, in order to boost the agency’s success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Il-Kungress beda jiffinanzja l-inizjattiva tal-oxxenità fis-sena fiskali tal-2005 u speċifika li l-FBI għandu jiddedika 10 aġenti għall-pornografija tal-adulti.
mt: 2005 was the first year the Congress funded the adult pornography initiative and specifically that the FBI dedicate 10 agents to the pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa wettaq l-ogħla punteġġ tal-innings, 70 run f’41 ballun biss billi laqat 11-il four u 2 sixes.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest innings score, 70 runs in 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Il-battituri tal-ordni tan-nofs, Sachin Tendulkar u Rahul Dravid, għamlu prestazzjoni tajba u għamlu sħubija ta’ mitt run.
mt: 50-over order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid made a good performance and made a century partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Iżda, wara li tilfet il-wicket tal-kaptan, l-Indja għamlet biss 36 ġirja u tilfet 7 wickets biex ittemm l-innings.
mt: But after losing the captain's wicket, India made only 36 runs and lost 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Il-President tal-Istati Uniti George W. Bush wasal f'Singapore fl-għodwa tas-16 ta' Novembru, biex beda mawra ta' ġimgħa madwar l-Asja.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Huwa ġie milqugħ mid-Deputat Prim Ministru ta’ Singapor Wong Kan Seng u ddiskuta kwistjonijiet ta’ kummerċ u terroriżmu mal-Prim Ministru ta’ Singapor Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was received by Singapore’s Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore’s Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Wara ġimgħa ta' telf fl-elezzjoni ta' nofs it-terminu, Bush kellem lill-udjenza dwar l-espansjoni tal-kummerċ fl-Asja.
mt: After a week of electoral defeat, Bush addressed the audience on the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Il-Prim Ministru Stephen Harper qabel li jibgħat “l-Att dwar l-Arja Nadifa” tal-gvern lil kumitat tal-partit kollu għal reviżjoni, qabel it-tieni qari tiegħu, wara l-laqgħa ta’ 25 minuta ta’ nhar it-Tlieta mal-mexxej tal-NDP Jack Layton fil-PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper said he will send the government’s “Clean Air Act” to the entire caucus for review, before its second reading, after a 25-minute meeting on Monday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton kien talab bidliet fl-abbozz ambjentali tal-konservattivi waqt il-laqgħa mal-PM, u talab għal "kitba mill-ġdid fid-dettall u kompluta" tal-abbozz ambjentali tal-partit Konservattiv.
mt: Layton had asked for changes to the Conservative environmental plan at the meeting with the PM, and asked for a "rewrite in detail and complete" of the Conservative environmental plan.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Minn meta intervjena l-Gvern Federali biex jieħu f’idejh il-finanzjament tal-isptar Mersey ġewwa Devonport, Tasmania, il-gvern statali u xi MPs federali kkritikaw dan l-att bħala gimmick ta’ qabel l-elezzjoni federali li se tissejjaħ sa Novembru.
mt: Since the Federal Government took over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized the move as a pre-election gimmick that will be held in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Iżda l-Prim Ministru John Howard qal li l-att sar biss biex jipproteġi lill-faċilitajiet tal-isptar milli jiġu degradati mill-gvern ta' Tasmanja', billi ngħataw AUD$45 miljun żejda.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to protect hospital facilities from being degraded by the Tasmanian government, which was offered AUD$45 million in compensation.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Skont l-aħħar bulettin, il-qari tal-livell tal-baħar indika li kien iġġenerat tsunami. Kien hemm xi attività definittivament ta' tsunami li ġiet irrekordjata qrib Pago Pago u Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the reading of the sea level indicated that a tsunami was generated. There was definitely some tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ma ġewx irrappurtati ħsarat jew korrimenti serji fit-Tonga, imma mar id-dawl temporanjament u dan, allegatament, impedixxa lill-awtoritajiet Tongani milli jirċievu t-twissija tat-tsunami maħruġa mill-PTWC.
mt: There were no reports of damage or serious injuries in Tonga, but the temporary loss of power, allegedly, prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Erbatax-il skola fil-Hawaii li jinsabu fuq il-kosti jew viċin tagħhom ingħalqu l-ġurnata kollha nhar l-Erbgħa minkejja li t-twissijiet tneħħew.
mt: 12 schools in Hawaii on or near the coast were closed for the entire day on Thursday despite the cancellation of tsunami warnings.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Il-President tal-Istati Uniti George W. Bush laqa' l-istqarrija.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush was briefed on the incident.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Il-kelliem għal Bush, Gordon Johndroe, sejjaħ il-wegħda tal-Korea ta’ Fuq bħala "pass importanti lejn l-għan li tinkiseb id-denuklearizzazzjoni verifikabbli tal-peniżola Koreana."
mt: Bush's spokesman, Gordon Johndroe, called the North Korean pledge "an important step toward the goal of verified denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: L-għaxar maltempata b'isem tal-istaġun tal-Uragani tal-Atlantiku, Maltempata Subtropikali Jerry, iffurmat fl-Oċean Atlantiku llum.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Iċ-Ċentru Nazzjonali tal-Uragani (NHC) jgħid li f’dan il-punt Jerry ma joħloq l-ebda theddida għall-art.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says at this point Jerry does not pose any threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Il-Korp tal-Inġiniera tal-Istati Uniti għamel stima li 6 pulzieri xita jistgħu jkissru l-ilqugħ tax-xmara li preċedentement saritilhom il-ħsara.
mt: 6 dams can be built to prevent the flooding of the river that previously caused damage.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Id-Disa’ Sala, li kellha għargħar għoli sa 20 pied waqt l-Uragan Katrina, bħalissa tinsab f’ilma għoli sal-qadd peress li l-eqreb diga kienet inqabżet.
mt: 8th Street, which had a 20-foot high berm during Hurricane Katrina, is now under water because the nearest levee was breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: L-ilma qed jaqbeż l-ilqugħ f'taqsima li hi wiesgħa 100 pied.
mt: 100-foot section of levee breached.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: L-Amministratur tal-Commons Adam Cuerden esprima l-frustrazzjoni tiegħu dwar it-tħassir meta tkellem ma’ Wikinews ix-xahar li għadda.
mt: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the vandalism when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Huwa [Wales] bażikament gidbilna mill-bidu nett. L-ewwel, billi jaġixxi bħallikieku dan sar għal raġunijiet legali. It-tieni, billi taparsi kien qed jismagħna, sat-tħassir tal-arti tiegħu."
mt: "He [Wales] was basically leading us from the beginning. First, because he was acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, because he was pretending to be on our side, until the unveiling of his art."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: L-irritazzjoni tal-komunità wasslet għal sforzi attwali biex titfassal politika rigward kontenut sesswali għas-sit li jospita miljuni ta’ midja liċenzjati b’mod miftuħ.
mt: Community outrage led to current efforts to draft policy regarding sexually explicit content for the site that hosts millions of licensed open media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Ix-xogħol li sar kien l-aktar teoretiku, imma l-programm inkiteb biex jistimula l-osservazzjonijiet magħmula tal-galassja Sagittarius.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to stimulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: L-effett li kien qed ifittex it-tim ikun ikkawżat mill-forzi tal-marea bejn il-materja skura tal-galassja u l-materja skura tat-Triq ta’ Sant’Anna.
mt: The effect that the team was looking for was caused by the forces of the tides between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Santa Anna Road.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Bħalma l-qamar għandu ġibda fuq l-art, u jikkawża mareati, hekk ukoll it-Triq ta’ Sant’Anna tagħmel forza fuq il-galassja ta’ Sagittarius.
mt: As the moon has tides on earth, so too does the Sagittarius galaxy have tides on the Milky Way.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ix-xjenzati waslu għall-konklużjoni li l-materja skura taffettwa lil materja skura oħra bħalma tagħmel il-materja regolari.
mt: Scientists have concluded that dark matter interacts with other dark matter in the same way that regular matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Din it-teorija tgħid li l-maġġoranza tal-materja skura madwar galassja tinsab madwar il-galassja f'tip ta' dijadema u hija magħmula minn ħafna partikuli żgħar.
mt: This theory says that the majority of dark matter around a galaxy is found around the galaxy in a disk and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Rapporti televiżivi juru duħħan abjad ħiereġ mill-impjant.
mt: Television reports show a white smoke plume rising from the facility.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: L-awtoritajiet lokali qed iwissu lir-residenti fil-viċinanza tal-impjant biex jibqgħu ġewwa, jitfu l-kundizzjonaturi tal-arja u ma jixorbux ilma tal-vit.
mt: Local authorities are advising residents near the plant to stay inside, close windows and not to drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Skont l-aġenzija nukleari tal-Ġappun, iċ-ċesju u l-jodju radjuattivi ġew identifikati fl-impjant.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were identified in the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: L-awtoritajiet jispekulaw li dan jindika li jista’ jkun li l-kontenituri li fihom fjuwil tal-uranju fis-sit inqasmu u qiegħdin inixxu.
mt: Authorities speculate that this may indicate that the uranium fuel rods in the reactor may have split and are leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr Tony Moll skopra t-Tuberkulożi Estremament Reżistenti għall-Mediċina (XDR-TB) fir-reġjun tal-Afrika t’Isfel KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: F’intervista, huwa qal li l-varjant il-ġdid kien "inkwetanti u allarmanti ħafna minħabba r-rata għolja ħafna ta’ fatalitajiet."
mt: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very alarming and worrying because of the high fatality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr Moll jaħseb li, Xi pazjenti setgħu ħadu l-bug mill-isptar, u mill-inqas tnejn kienu ħaddiema tas-saħħa tal-isptar.
mt: Dr Moll believes that some patients may have taken the bug from the hospital, and at least two were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
